rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i]Keen Eye[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it wasn't being declared an attacker, Igrene, Nabata Protector deals 1 damage to that creatures controller.
[i]Desert Sniper[/i] – Archers you control have “{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature, then tap it.”
